title: The devil's an interesting figure.
body:
I don't quite understand how you can occupy a religion that worships an entity that commands genocide against an innocent group of people because someone completely unrelated to them broke a law that hadn't been made yet, and somehow be labeled the ultimate force of evil.

It's legitimately confusing.

Like, one of the few things I can think of that he even did was get the first two morons to eat the tree of knowledge. Which is basically to say he granted the gift of intelligence to people.
But somehow he's evil.
And the guy who decided that everyone dies because two people were convinced to eat a fruit is made out to be the good guy.

Like damn.
The scapegoating is unreal.
